data_description.thermostat_type: Only one central configuration type is possible

menu.title: Menu
menu.description: Configure your thermostat. You will be able to finalize the configuration when all required parameters are entered.

data.name: Name
data.use_central_mode: Enable the control by central entity (requires central config). Check to enable the control of the VTherm with the select central_mode entities.
data.use_main_central_config: Use additional central main configuration. Check to use the central main configuration (outdoor temperature, min, max, step, ...).
data.used_by_controls_central_boiler: Used by central boiler. Check if this VTherm should have control on the central boiler

data_description.external_temperature_sensor_entity_id: Outdoor temperature sensor entity id. Not used if central configuration is selected

data.use_central_boiler_feature: Use a central boiler. Check to add a control to your central boiler. You will have to configure the VTherm which will have a control of the central boiler after seecting this checkbox to take effect. If one VTherm requires heating, the boiler will be turned on. If no VTherm requires heating, the boiler will be turned off. Commands for turning on/off the central boiler are given in the related configuration page

data.auto_regulation_use_device_temp: Use internal temperature of the underlying

data_description.heater_entity2_id: Optional 2nd Heater entity id. Leave empty if not required
data_description.heater_entity3_id: Optional 3rd Heater entity id. Leave empty if not required
data_description.heater_entity4_id: Optional 4th Heater entity id. Leave empty if not required
data_description.heater_keep_alive: Optional heater switch state refresh interval. Leave empty if not required.
data_description.proportional_function: Algorithm to use (TPI is the only one for now)
data_description.auto_regulation_mode: Auto adjustment of the target temperature
data_description.auto_regulation_dtemp: The threshold in ° (or % for valve) under which the temperature change will not be sent
data_description.auto_regulation_periode_min: Duration in minutes between two regulation update
data_description.auto_regulation_use_device_temp: Use the eventual internal temperature sensor of the underlying to speedup the self-regulation
data_description.inverse_switch_command: For switch with pilot wire and diode you may need to inverse the command
data_description.auto_fan_mode: Automatically activate fan when huge heating/cooling is necessary

data_description.tpi_coef_int: Coefficient to use for internal temperature delta
data_description.tpi_coef_ext: Coefficient to use for external temperature delta
data_description.use_tpi_central_config: Check to use the central TPI configuration. Uncheck to use a specific TPI configuration for this VTherm

presets.title: Presets
presets.description: Select if the thermostat will use central preset - deselect for the thermostat to have its own presets

window.title: Window management
window.description:
Open window management.
You can also configure automatic window open detection based on temperature decrease

data.window_auto_open_threshold: Temperature decrease threshold for automatic window open detection (in °/hours)
data.window_auto_close_threshold: Temperature increase threshold for end of automatic detection (in °/hours)
data.window_auto_max_duration: Maximum duration of automatic window open detection (in min)

data_description.window_sensor_entity_id: Leave empty if no window sensor should be used and to use the automatic detection
data_description.window_delay: The delay in seconds before sensor detection is taken into account
data_description.window_auto_open_threshold: Recommended value: between 3 and 10. Leave empty if automatic window open detection is not used
data_description.window_auto_close_threshold: Recommended value: 0. Leave empty if automatic window open detection is not used
data_description.window_auto_max_duration: Recommended value: 60 (one hour). Leave empty if automatic window open detection is not used
data_description.use_window_central_config: Select to use the central window configuration. Deselect to use a specific window configuration for this VTherm
data_description.window_action: Action to perform if window is deteted as open

motion.title: Motion management
motion.description:
Motion sensor management. Preset can switch automatically depending on motion detection
motion_preset and no_motion_preset should be set to the corresponding preset name

data_description.motion_sensor_entity_id: The entity id of the motion sensor
data_description.motion_preset: Preset to use when motion is detected
data_description.no_motion_preset: Preset to use when no motion is detected
data_description.use_motion_central_config: Check to use the central motion configuration. Uncheck to use a specific motion configuration for this VTherm

power.title: Power management
power.description:
Power management attributes.
Gives the power and max power sensor of your home.
Specify the power consumption of the heater when on.
All sensors and device power should use the same unit (kW or W).

data_description.use_power_central_config: Check to use the central power configuration. Uncheck to use a specific power configuration for this VTherm

presence.title: Presence management
presence.description:
Presence management attributes.
Gives the a presence sensor of your home (true is someone is present) and give the corresponding temperature preset setting.

data.use_presence_central_config: Use central presence temperature configuration. Deselect to use specific temperature entities

advanced.title: Advanced parameters
advanced.description:
Configuration of advanced parameters. Leave the default values if you don't know what you are doing.
These parameters can lead to very poor temperature control or bad power regulation.

data.security_min_on_percent: Minimum power percent to enable safety mode
data.security_default_on_percent: Power percent to use in safety mode

data_description.minimal_activation_delay: Delay in seconds under which the equipment will not be activated
data_description.security_delay_min: Maximum allowed delay in minutes between two temperature measurements. Above this delay the thermostat will turn to a safety off state
data_description.security_min_on_percent: Minimum heating percent value for safety preset activation. Below this amount of power percent the thermostat won't go into safety preset
data_description.security_default_on_percent: The default heating power percent value in safety preset. Set to 0 to switch off heater in safety preset
data_description.use_advanced_central_config: Check to use the central advanced configuration. Uncheck to use a specific advanced configuration for this VTherm

error.window_open_detection_method: Only one window open detection method should be used. Use either window sensor or automatic detection through temperature threshold but not both
error.no_central_config: You cannot select 'use central configuration' because no central configuration was found. You need to create a Versatile Thermostat of type 'Central Configuration' to use it.
